message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"something you like to do; hobby","sentence":"我爱好唱歌。","image_prompt":"A young person, in a softly apocalyptic animated world, stands on an empty rooftop singing joyfully. The sky glows with gentle, unusual colors that hint at an atmospheric shift. The person's posture is expressive—arms open, mouth singing, eyes happy. Subtle, soft urban decay is visible: cracked walls, overgrown plants encroaching on the roof. Emphasize a dreamy, hopeful mood, with musical notes floating in the air.","sentence_translation":"I like singing."}
